item.title: 001. Testing the Limits of Atmospheric Predictability
item.description: We discuss a fascinating paper from UW that challenges the 14-day limit of weather prediction using machine learning, exploring chaos theory, initial conditions, and what it means for our relationship with the unknowable future.
